label: uncl5419
comment: Code qualifying the type of rate.

values.label: Actual versus calculated price difference rate
values.comment: Difference rate of actual price and calculated price.

values.label: Standard labour rate
values.comment: Labour rate for a normal working day. Synonym: Straight time.

values.label: Calculation rate
values.comment: To identify a rate which is to be applied in a calculation.

values.label: Coefficient
values.comment: The coefficient which is to be used as a multiplier.

values.label: Indemnity rate
values.comment: To specify the rate of an indemnity.

values.label: Guarantee reserved calculation rate
values.comment: To specify the rate that has been used to calculate the monetary amount reserved as a guarantee.

values.label: Waiting time indemnity rate
values.comment: To specify the rate of an indemnity for waiting.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: The rate type is mutually agreed by the interchanging parties.
